name: The Eldorado Mission
description:
The H.M.S. ELDORADO is your submarine, send to retrieve as much treasure as possible before the covert operation is blown. Use your sonar and cartography unit to navigate the pitch black waters.

For a more detailed explanation of how to play click on the User Manual and Mission Brief pages in the bottom corners of the play screen!

We decided to invert the theme: You are wandering in the dark, i.e. directionless

Quickfire Infos:
-Supplies: +2 health, torpedoes 100%, energy 100%
-Scoring: (secondsLeft * 0.5f + treasure  - healthLost * 50) * aliveBonus

Assets made in other jams, re-used:
-Leaderboard System
-Menu System

Known bugs:
-Dropping a chests may result in a collision penalty. Try to drop them while going full throttle, it seems to lessen the issue.
-Sometimes the alive multiplier doesnt apply
